aircraft.value: Kestrel Patrol - AC-5560-692 at Forward Operating Base-1

defect_observed.value: Battery thermal runaway indication. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Lighting System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 07/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 10/07/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 08/07/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 11/07/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 14/07/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
